column4: hi, why ubuntu uses pc speaker as a system sound? In pindgin, firefox, terminal i hear this stupid "beep" from my box. Also when i try to close or restart system there is a long 2 seconds "beep" after i confirm restart action. Anyone knows how to get rid of this annoying useless beeps? Im using Jaunty
Rip out the PC-speaker. Always the best solution <3
Or if you build your own computer, never attach the cable :P
not good idea, beeps are sometimes useful (informs about hardware failure)
